snippet.title: Moonflower Trailer
snippet.description:
High Alchemist Nika Skylar is an acclaimed alchemist invited as an honoured guest at the Moonfaire. A state held festival to celebrate a rare event of the silver moon. An event that occurs only one every century and fuels the magic of their kingdom for the next hundred years.

During a night of celebration, activity and tradition, tragedy strikes.

A derailed ritual, a murder, a traitor.

Moonflower is a BL visual novel developed by Cats on a Lilypad Studios


Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2145530/Moonflower/
Itch: https://cats-on-a-lilypad-studios.itch.io/moonflower


CREDITS
Game: Moonflower
Developer: Cats on a Lilypad Studios (https://linktr.ee/CatsLilypadStudios)
Trailer: Donut Duchess (https://linktr.ee/donutduchess)
